caption.title: (a) DSC curves of PP separator and FCCN separator, (b) Thermal shrinkage rate of PP separator and FCCN separator over a temperature range from 100°C to 150°C, and the inset is the photograph of PP separator and FCCN separator after thermal treatment at 150°C for 0.5 h, (c) Contact test between hot electric iron tip and separators, (d) Combustion behavior of PP separator and FCCN separator.
